title: Getting Started with Next.js
content:
# Getting Started with Next.js Next.js is a **React framework** that enables server-side rendering and static site generation. ## Key Features - File-based routing - API routes - Built-in CSS support - Image optimization ```javascript // Example page in Next.js function Home() { return
